support.faq1Answer: You can book tickets by browsing events, selecting your preferred seats, and completing the payment process using any UPI app.
support.faq2Question: How do I get my tickets after booking?
support.faq2Answer: Once your payment is confirmed, you'll receive an email with your e-tickets. You can also download them from the confirmation page.
support.faq3Question: Can I cancel or request a refund for my tickets?
support.faq3Answer: Refund policies vary by event. Please check the event details page for specific refund policies or contact our support team for assistance.
support.faq4Question: How do I view the venue in AR?
support.faq4Answer: On the event details page, click on 'View Venue in AR' to experience an augmented reality view of the venue from your selected seat.
